about_the_game:
What if a powerful wizard wanted to build a zoo for all kinds of different fantasy animals? In Fantasy Zoo you can build your own zoo for many unique creatures. Instead of normal animals like elephants or lions fill your zoo with monsters like dragons and griffins.

Animals

Keep your animals happy by building good enclosures for them and offer them food and shelter.

Some animals are dangerous, you need to make their enclosures strong enough. Prevent escape by building strong walls or blocking their access to weak walls with barricades or other objects, use magic to keep flying animals at ground.

Spells


Use thematic tools to manage and build the zoo. Move things by teleporting and stop dangerous animals from rampaging with ice spell.

Mana


Use magical crystals to prevent animals from escaping and have other utility effects. Simple mana mechanic limits the spell usage and is required as upkeep for the crystals.

Light Management


Fantasy Zoo offers light gold management. Keep your guests happy for gold income. Choose from different workers and think about costs before getting new animals.

Mayhem


Simple combat mechanic makes the escaping animals dangerous. Stop escaping animals with spells and the zoo staff, or let them rampage and enjoy the mayhem.

Current content and features.

  • 17 animals
  • 5 different environments.
  • Freeform gameplay with different starting money and map size.
  • Basic researchtree for progression mode.
  • Simple combat mechanic for escaped animals
  • Flying and petrifying animals
  • Multiple pylons for magical effects
detailed_description:
What if a powerful wizard wanted to build a zoo for all kinds of different fantasy animals? In Fantasy Zoo you can build your own zoo for many unique creatures. Instead of normal animals like elephants or lions fill your zoo with monsters like dragons and griffins.

Animals

Keep your animals happy by building good enclosures for them and offer them food and shelter.

Some animals are dangerous, you need to make their enclosures strong enough. Prevent escape by building strong walls or blocking their access to weak walls with barricades or other objects, use magic to keep flying animals at ground.

Mana

Light Management


Fantasy Zoo offers light gold management. Keep your guests happy for gold income. Choose from different workers and think about costs before getting new animals.

  • Simple combat mechanic for escaped animals

  • Multiple pylons for magical effects
name: Fantasy Zoo
short_description: Fantasy Zoo is a thematic zoo builder where you build zoo for fantasy animals in a fantasy world. Fill the zoo with animals and monsters from mythology and fantasy pop culture. Manage and build the zoo with help of magic.
